ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay then tell me this. How does this nerf prevent me from pummeling a single roaming mob for instance aviaks in SK and fding and letting a lowbie still kill
ygData.messageBody:
Okay then tell me this. How does this nerf prevent me from pummeling a single roaming mob for instance aviaks in SK and fding and letting a lowbie still kill it? I would only be aggroing one mob in the middle of nowhere. The memory of a mob has nothing to do with that. This change only greatly effects the dungeon pullers.
----- Original Message -----
From: Kevin
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 6:59 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death


This is from EQ_Clerics:

Monks have officially been nerfed, their feign death skill can no
longer be used to split mobs. We found this out the hard way in
the king area of Lower Guk, almost got us all killed. We did some
testing, and sure enough as soon as our monk would stand up all the
frogs would leave their post and come running. (we had a couple
good-factioned lookouts watching along their path.)

I think this was done to prevent Powerleveling. A Monk could fight a MOB to very low health..FD..and anyone
else could come up..finish the MOB and get full exp. I sure hope they find a different solution.



----- Original Message -----
From: Tim Perkins
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 11:22 AM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Feign Death


I am suprised it hasn't started already. I just wanted to share with you my Post nerf FD experimentaion.

Sol A green Flame goblins. the goblins I was experimenting with were on the floor near the passage to where the Foreman spawns. I succesfully feigned them at this point. they returned to thier spawn points . I stood up they immediatly came back. so I feign again they return to thier points I get up and run all the way to the small bridge type thing near the sol b spawn point. I fd again. I was several mins stand up wait a few and here they come a running at me. I fd again let them walk away. get up and they come back.

A fellow monk on my server experimented in Lguk with some Dar Undead frogs and had similar results even after 5 mins of feign time.


any other people doing experimentation out there?


Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 45th .....
E-Marr
Da`Kor
